title: Interview with Professor Louise Archer
description: In this episode, Matthew interviews Prof Louise Archer (Karl Mannheim Professor of Sociology of Education at the University College London Institute of Education) on her research into education and inequality.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew interviews Prof Louise Archer (Karl Mannheim Professor of Sociology of Education at the University College London Institute of Education) on her research into education and inequality.
